name: Warper - 2021 Epic MegaJam
description:
Warper is a 3d decision based point and click game for the 2021 Epic MegaJam theme "Running out of space" made in three days by wolfftertainment. (10 Seconds too late because I accidentally clicked on upload instead of submit)

Jump from planet to planet to gather ressources and manpower to be able to escape from a forever growing black hole. Encounter various events in which you have to decide the destiny of your ship and your crew!

CONTROLS

You only need your mouse!
